content: erratum there was a mistake in the decrease section it has been fixed 13 decrease 2024 the pdfs now available have the correct version this is the 2024 yearly kal in the beginner s knit-along group 1 cécile moderator will design/use a different stich pattern each month to be published both in chart and written form **on the 10th each month of 2024** edit **a danish translation is available** month after month care of marianneho /people/marianneho - november is here 2 meant to be a **sampler blanket** this pattern like our previous yearly kals in the group is open to any kind of interpretation you can knit 12 cloths 12 blanket squares 12 hats 12 cowls 12 pairs of mitts or slippers 12 tissue box cosies… we provide a monthly stich pattern feel free to use it as you wish there will be textured squares lace squares cable squares advanced textured squares something for all from beginner to advanced knitter an opportunity to try new stitch patterns on a relatively small item each square blocks at 28 x 28 cm the sample is knitted in **dk yarn** but you can easily adapt it to any thickness by just knitted a few more/fewer stitches to get the wanted width with your chosen yarn you will need us 6 4mm needles and between 700 m and 900 m of yarn depending on how large you make your squares **caution** this is only an evaluated meterage since the pattern doesn t exist yet it s impossible to forecast precisely 1 https //www ravelry com/groups/beginners-knit-along-2 2 https //strikkeglad dk/53839/sampler-2024-november/
